TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Tuple extends System.Object
public ref class Tuple abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于创造元组对象的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating tuple objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是一种数据结构，具有特定数量和元素序列。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of elements. 元组的一个示例是用于存储人员的姓名等标识符的第一个元素，第二个元素和人员收入中该年度第三个元素中的每一年中的数据结构具有三个元素 （称为 3 元组或三元组）。An example of a tuple is a data structure with three elements (known as a 3-tuple or triple) that is used to store an identifier such as a person's name in the first element, a year in the second element, and the person's income for that year in the third element. .NET Framework 直接支持具有 1 到 7 元素的元组。The .NET Framework directly supports tuples with one to seven elements. 此外，您可以创建由嵌套中的元组对象的元组的八个或多个元素属性对象。In addition, you can create tuples of eight or more elements by nesting tuple objects in the property of a object. 元组常用四种方法：Tuples are commonly used in four ways: - 来表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，一个元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. - 若要从方法返回多个值，而无需使用`out`参数 （在 C# 中) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without using `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，允许你提供一个线程在启动时执行的方法的值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup time. 如果你提供对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供有三个项的数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with three items of data. 类不本身表示元组。The class does not itself represent a tuple. 相反，它是提供用于创造元组类型支持.NET Framework 的实例的静态方法的类。Instead, it is a class that provides static methods for creating instances of the tuple types that are supported by the .NET Framework. 它提供了你可以调用实例化元组对象，而无需显式指定的每个元组组件类型的帮助器方法。It provides helper methods that you can call to instantiate tuple objects without having to explicitly specify the type of each tuple component. 虽然你可以通过调用其类构造函数创建元组类的实例，若要这样做的代码会比较麻烦。Although you can create an instance of a tuple class by calling its class constructor, the code to do so can be cumbersome. 下面的示例使用类构造函数来创建 7 元组，或七元组，其中包含从 1950 年到 2000 年每次人口普查的纽约填充数据。The following example uses a class constructor to create a 7-tuple or septuple that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1950 through 2000. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 通过使用一个帮助器方法创建相同的元组对象是更为简单，如以下示例所示。Creating the same tuple object by using a helper method is more straightforward, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/cs/example1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/vb/example1.vb#2)] 帮助器方法直接支持创建有一至八个组件 （即，到八元组的单一实例） 的元组对象。The helper methods directly support the creation of tuple objects that have from one to eight components (that is, singletons through octuples). 尽管没有组件的数量没有实际限制但元组可能具有，帮助程序方法不是可用于创建具有九个或多个组件的元组。Although there is no practical limit to the number of components a tuple may have, helper methods are not available to create a tuple with nine or more components. 若要创建此类元组，必须调用构造函数。To create such a tuple, you must call the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 有关其他信息和使用元组的示例，请参阅.NET Framework 中的各个元组类型的文档。For additional information and examples that use tuples, see the documentation for the individual tuple types in the .NET Framework. 在本主题末尾的另请参阅部分中列出了这些加载项。These are listed in the See Also section at the end of this topic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 8 元组 （八元组） 包含小于 20 的质数。The following example creates an 8-tuple (octuple) that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)]

span.span: Creates a new tuple object.

summary.span: 创建新的 1 元组，即单一实例。

A tuple whose value is ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种帮助器方法，你可以调用实例化的 1 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate a 1-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the type of its component. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个 1 元组，其元素类型的。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 1-tuple whose component is of type . [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#1)] 此代码是等效于对的以下调用类构造函数。This code is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 创建新的 7 元组，即七元组。

span.span: Creates a new 7-tuple, or septuple.
A 7-tuple whose value is (, , , , , , ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种帮助器方法，可以调用以实例化 7 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate a 7-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化 7 元组。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 7-tuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#13)] 此代码是等效于对的以下调用类构造函数。This code is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#14)]

summary.span: 创建新的 8 元组，即八元组。

span.span: Creates a new 8-tuple, or octuple.
An 8-tuple (octuple) whose value is (, , , , , , , ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种帮助器方法，可以调用以实例化的 8 元组，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate an 8-tuple without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用构造函数来创建具有九个或多个组件的元组，除非你的语言为此目的提供了一种特殊语法。You must call the constructor to create a tuple with nine or more components unless your language provides a special syntax for this purpose. 静态 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 的方法类不能用于创建具有九个或多个组件的元组。The static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods of the class cannot be used to create a tuple with nine or more components. ## Examples 下面的示例创建其组件是小于 20 的质数 8-元组。The following example creates an 8-tuple whose components are prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 这相当于以下示例中，它使用类构造函数，而不是工厂创建方法。This is equivalent to the following example, which uses the class constructor instead of the factory creation method. 请注意该实例化对象以这种方式涉及相当多的代码，因为您必须声明嵌套对象作为对象的第八个组件，以生成一个八元组。Note that instantiating a object in this way involves considerably more code, because you must declare a nested object as the object's eighth component to produce an octuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/ctor8.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/ctor8.vb#20)]
